share: California Guitar Trio Plays Daydreaming By Radiohead

By Anthony Garone

The California Guitar Trio performs Radiohead's Daydreaming live in 4K.

Find California Guitar Trio on:

Like what you see here?

Please consider a monthly donation on Patreon! We are taking orders for shirts and accepting donations of code, content creation and translation, art, social media help, and money.

Follow Make Weird Music on Facebook, Twitter, YouTube, Instagram.

Background

The California Guitar Trio performed a show at the Musical Instrument Museum in Phoenix, Arizona on February 24, 2018. Before the show, we spent about an hour talking and filmed a great interview, which should be online and available later this month. In the meantime, I wanted to release this beautiful performance of Radiohead’s song Daydreaming.

This is our first 4K video release, too. So, hopefully you high-fidelity video fans enjoy that! It’s still new to me, but I’m happy with how it turned out.

Video

And here’s the original music video by Radiohead.
